game.name: The King's Courier
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Life can be tough as a medieval courier. Explore a colourful environment as you plan your daily deliveries, select cards to help optimise your route and purchase upgrades to increase efficiency!
